console.description: Start a repl console that provides context and convenient utilities to interact with the blockchain and your contracts.

network.name: network
network.description: network to deploy to from config.terrain.json

prefix.name: prefix
prefix.description: address prefix of target chain, all chains supported by Station are supported by terrain

deploy.description: Build wasm bytecode, store code on chain and instantiate.

no-rebuild.name: no-rebuild
no-rebuild.description: deploy the wasm bytecode as is.

instance-id.name: instance-id
instance-id.description: enable management of multiple instances of the same contract

admin-address.name: admin-address
admin-address.description: set custom address as contract admin to allow migration.

no-sync.name: no-sync
no-sync.description: don't attempt to sync contract refs to frontend.
